game.name: Train Traffic Manager
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아비규환 특급 열차에 모두 올라타세요! Train Traffic Manager에서 당신은 아수라장의 거장이 되어 열차와 도개교, 대변혁을 지휘하게 돼요. 냉정을 유지한 채 열차가철로를 돌도록 하며 그 와중에 유머 감각을 잊지 마세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All aboard the chaos express! In Train Traffic Manager, you're the maestro of mayhem, directing an orchestra of trains, drawbridges, and cataclysms. Keep your cool, your trains on track, and your sense of humor intact!
